WorkItem.Description:
Unlike ProtWarr module that takes defensive stance and improved defensive stance in account for magic damage taken this seems to be completely missing from bear module for talent Protector of the Pack.
Â 
Buffs like Inspiration and Ancestral healing which reduce magic damage are also not calculated.
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] Talent Protector of the Pack and buffs Inspiration/Ancestral Healing are not being calculated in average spell damage reduction or spell survival

Comments.Message:
Ancestral Healing/Inspiration do not affect magic damage, physical only.
Looks like it already does include Protector of the Pack.
